definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: Exact name of item, Model of machine, quantity, unit price.
sentences.chinese: 展品的品名，機器型號，數量，及單價。

sentences.english: China is a contracting party to the International Convention on the Harmonised Commodity Description and Coding System.
sentences.chinese: 我國是《商品名稱和編碼的協調製度公約》締約國。

sentences.english: For example, each time a new product name is added, you can have it trigger a batch update .
sentences.chinese: 例如，每當添加新產品名時，可以讓它觸發批量更新。

sentences.english: "Hongshenghuo works"the name seal on the opposite work.
sentences.chinese: 作品反面加蓋紅勝火作品名稱專用章。

sentences.english: The names of products and companies can be optionally printed in colors.
sentences.chinese: 產品名及公司名可以使用多種色彩隨意印刷。

sentences.english: Write the item on the top of the piece of paper.
sentences.chinese: 在價格表的頂部寫上商品名稱。

sentences.english: The second line defines the product name.
The description of the goods in the commercial invoice must correspond with the description in the credit .
sentences.chinese: 發票上的商品名稱必須與信用證上的品名相一致。

sentences.english: The description of the goods in the commercial invoice must correspond with the description in the credit .
sentences.chinese: 發票上的商品名稱必須與信用證上的品名相一致。

sentences.english: The names of dangerous articles shall be prescribed and published by the competent civil aviation authority under the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 危險品品名由國務院民用航空主管部門規定並公佈。

sentences.english: The list is in no particular order. Tick the little box in front of the poem's name.
sentences.chinese: 作品排序不分前後，請在作品名稱前的框內打鉤。

sentences.english: The slogan is a pun on the name of the product.
sentences.chinese: 那廣告用語與其產品名稱一語雙關。

sentences.english: The letters BDL in the product's name refer to the regulatory term.
sentences.chinese: 產品名稱中的字母BDL指的是監管期限。

sentences.english: It even scraped off the product's name where it appeared below the samples.
sentences.chinese: 三星甚至刮掉了樣品下的產品名稱。

sentences.english: Find products by searching product information such as product name or ingredient.
sentences.chinese: 支持產品名或活性成分搜索。

sentences.english: The designer could be left only with his name and a handful of licenses.
sentences.chinese: 設計師只保有其品名和少數許可。
